Through regular meetings and referrals, we were able to showcase our unique offerings to a wider audience, not just in Hyderabad but across the globe. The support from fellow BNI members helped us refine our marketing strategies and enhance our customer service, allowing us to build lasting relationships with clients. As a result, Atelier by AK has expanded its reach and solidified its reputation for quality bespoke clothing. Today, we celebrate not only our local success but also our growing international presence, all thanks to the powerful network of BNI that continues to inspire and uplift our journey.

name: Ravi Kumar

my_business:
Ravi Kumar's Insurance Services Ravi Kumar offers a wide range of insurance services, catering to diverse needs. Here's an overview: 
Insurance Categories
Life Insurance: Comprehensive life insurance solutions
Health Insurance: Coverage for individuals and families
General Insurance:- Car Insurance - Travel Insurance - Commercial Insurance - Home Insurance - Employee Insurance - Worker Insurance - Factory Insurance - Businessman Insurance - Public Liability Insurance - Construction All Risks - Erection All Risks - Employee Compensation Insurance - Property All Risk Insurance 
Target Audience Ravi Kumar is looking to connect with:
Individuals: Seeking insurance coverage for personal needs
Builders and Developers: Interested in insurance solutions for projects
Corporate Entities: Looking for employee, worker, or business insurance
Group/Community: Insurance solutions for groups or communities
Specific Focus Ravi Kumar is particularly interested in connecting with individuals or entities
top_product: Top product for insurance" can mean different things depending on what type of insurance you're referring to. Here's a breakdown of top insurance products by category:
ideal_referral: Has a need for RAVI KING ASSOCIATES — for example, a family looking for life insurance, a homeowner seeking better home coverage, or a business owner needing liability protection. name: Sravika Ponduru
company_address: Jubilee hills, Hyderabad, HYD, TS
my_business:
Sravika Diamonds specializes in luxury jewelry experiences.
Our focus is on ethically sourced diamonds and precious gemstones set in meticulously crafted designs.
We offer a personalized journey for clients seeking symbols of love, success, or celebration.
Our store is a destination for engagement rings, bespoke creations, and timeless elegance.
Sravika Diamonds stands for quality, expertise, and individualized beauty in fine jewelry.
top_product: Our Top Product is fully customised diamond engagement rings and bridal jewellery sets. Each piece is designed from scratch, using certified diamonds and hallmark gold, ensuring exclusivity, elegance, and perfect personalisation for every client.
ideal_referral: My Ideal Referral is: ✨ Brides-to-be, grooms-to-be, or families planning a wedding ✨ Anyone celebrating a major milestone—anniversary, birthday, engagement ✨ Individuals looking for premium personalised gifts ✨ Customers wanting to redesign old jewellery into modern styles Anyone who says: “I want something unique” is a perfect referral for Sravika Diamonds.
top_problem_solved: We solve the biggest problem in jewellery buying: “I can’t find exactly what I want in an affordable price." Clients often struggle with: ✔ Designs that don’t match their taste ✔ Lack of customization options ✔ Confusing pricing for diamonds and gold ✔ Redesigning old or sentimental jewellery At Sravika Diamonds, we provide: ✔ Bespoke design with 3D previews ✔ Transparent pricing ✔ Certified stones ✔ Personalised craftsmanship ✔ Customisation within budget We turn the dream jewelry in their mind into a masterpiece they can wear.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable BNI moments came through a referral from a fellow chapter member who is a professional makeup artist. She was working closely with a bride who wanted jewelry that truly matched her personality and her wedding looks—but she wasn’t finding anything unique in the market. My member instantly thought of Sravika Diamonds and connected us. From the very first consultation, the bride shared her dream: two distinct bridal looks, each meaningful and elegant in its own way. Together, we designed her complete jewelry ensemble—right from the choice of diamonds and gold, to the intricate detailing, to making sure each set perfectly complemented her outfits and style. We created: ✨ A traditional, graceful wedding Gold set for the ceremony ✨ A modern, contemporary look Diamond set for her reception When she saw the final pieces, she became emotional. She said the jewellery felt like her story, her identity, and her joy captured in every detail. For me, that moment was priceless. This experience reminded me why BNI works so beautifully— trusted relationships lead to meaningful referrals, and meaningful referrals allow us to create unforgettable moments.

my_business: At Khushboo Agencies, we manufacture a wide range of spare parts for rice mills, with a focus on De-Husking Rubber Rollers and Rice Mill Screens. Our aim is to provide reliable, durable products that help rice mills run smoothly and efficiently. With years of experience, we understand the needs of the industry and are committed to delivering quality parts that make a difference in daily operations.
top_product: From high-performance de-husking rollers that keep rice mills running smoothly, to YOU, a wax-oil-based car perfume with zero spray, zero wick, and all class, every product I work on focuses on quality, design, and experience. Each one solves a specific problem and is built to last.
ideal_referral: An ideal referral for me would be: 1. Retailers, Auto Detailers & Gifting Stores – looking to stock YOU, our luxury car perfume that blends sleek design with subtle, long-lasting scent.
top_problem_solved: A rice mill in Andhra Pradesh faced constant breakdowns due to poor-quality rollers. Our upgrade improved both uptime and consistency. On the other side, many car owners were tired of cheap, overpowering fresheners. YOU gave them an elegant, subtle solution they didn’t know they needed.
my_favourite_bni_story: Got connected to a rice mill owner in Jagithal who was looking to sell his broken rice to breweries. I connected him to the right buyer, helped close the deal, and ended up getting his spare parts business as well. One referral, two wins—classic BNI synergy.
